ygData.subject: Re: Confession Of a Monk P2
ygData.msgSnippet: ... better ... Oh, that I m really not too sure.  But I believe the only non-clothes armor we wiz can wear must be those super-expensive magical armor, hehe.
ygData.messageBody:
> >>Opps, forgot. But I *believe* at later stages hor, you can get much
better
> armour. I will try to assist you in finding out if I ever get the chance.

Oh, that I'm really not too sure. But I believe the only non-clothes armor
we wiz can wear must be those super-expensive magical armor, hehe.

> >>I heard tanking was tough? Or do your use pets?

Hmm, unlike enchanter, magi and necro, we wiz do not have summoning spells,
sigh. Those spell casters with summoning spells are actually a tank *and*
a mage, thou they are not tank mage. On the other hand, our offensive
spells are the most damaging amg all spell casters, esp at the higher lvl.
Our style is simple - all out offense - not u doom then I die ;) I read
from an online guide which said the best defend is offense, afterall, no
need defend if u wipe all ya enemies, hehe.

> So far I never asked any pple for armor/weap after I died - since they
> doesn't help much and I'm prepare to die again in the course of
retrieving
> my corpse, hehe, so dun waste others' money ;)
> >>Cool! Same pattern as you.

Heheh. On the other hand, I come across few lvl 4-6 players who approach
me for stuffs after they died, one time is when I just died 4 times on a
straight row. Really dunno how these pple play. If they want good XP,
they must group up so as to take tougher monsters. Yet they wanan take the
risk of gaining all XP solo, and when they died, they merely go ard asking
for stuff rather than making an effort to find their corpse. .

> >>Aiyo! Don't worry! We can still group no matter what ;-) but not for
too
> long if the gap is REAL big...

Hehe, already applying for line connection. Once it's rdy, see u guys in
EQ again ;)


Ziltus
